subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Noah Syndergaard, a top Mets prospect, is benefiting from the tutelage of Frank Viola, a former Cy Young Award winner and the pitching coach at the Mets Class AAA affiliate.
snippet: Noah Syndergaard, a top Mets prospect, is benefiting from the tutelage of Frank Viola, a former Cy Young Award winner and the pitching coach at the Mets Class AAA affiliate.
